body: Does it happen for v1.1.0? It is probably related to #5602.
Also I can't reproduce with file, if I just replace the default app with it some JavaScript exception happens.
@zcbenz Confirmed that 1.1.0 is fine, and 1.1.1 is broken

It seems that the crash came from `PLOG` when printing to stderr, and there were other people meeting the same problem when linking statically with VC++ 2015:
- https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1257722
- https://rt.perl.org/Public/Bug/Display.html?id=125714

The biggest problem for me now is I don't have a test case to reproduce this.
@zcbenz Here's a version of Slack based on Electron 1.1.2 that exhibits this bug: http://cl.ly/153a3W470D1d

I got a different stack trace from the one you pasted:

@zcbenz Hm, interesting - I didn't actually grab out the stack trace from 1.1.2, I just assumed it would be the same
It appears that disabling crash reporter gets us running again in 1.1.2. Do you want me to build a 1.1.1 version to try?
@paulcbetts I have found the root cause, working on a PR now.
